oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial view of Tennessee State Capitol in downtown Nashville, 1961 March 16
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An aerial view of the Tennessee State Capitol area in downtown Nashville, March 16, 1961. The circular pattern on the right is the early construction site of the Municipal Auditorium on Fifth Avenue. Some of the other buildings along 5th and 6th Avenues and Charlotte Avenue are pictured, as well as some of War Memorial Plaza. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee State Capitol (Nashville, Tenn.)
